thread.title: BRIEF-Lennar's Board Of Directors Elects New Executive Positions

title: BRIEF-Lennar's Board Of Directors Elects New Executive Positions
text:
April 12, 2018 / 10:08 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Lennar's Board Of Directors Elects New Executive Positions Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Lennar Corp: 
* LENNAR’S BOARD OF DIRECTORS ELECTS NEW EXECUTIVE POSITIONS 
* BOARD HAS ELECTED STUART MILLER, RICK BECKWITT, JON JAFFE, BRUCE GROSS AND DIANE BESSETTE TO NEW EXECUTIVE POSITIONS WITH COMPANY 
* STUART MILLER WILL CONTINUE HIS LEADERSHIP ROLE WITH LENNAR AS NEWLY APPOINTED EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN 
* RICK BECKWITT HAS BEEN ELECTED AS NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF LENNAR 
* DIANE BESSETTE HAS BEEN ELECTED AS NEW CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER OF LENNAR AND WILL CONTINUE AS COMPANY’S TREASURER * JON JAFFE HAS BEEN ELECTED AS NEW PRESIDENT OF LENNAR 
* JAFFE WILL CONTINUE AS COMPANY’S CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER * JAFFE WAS ALSO ELECTED TO LENNAR BOARD OF DIRECTORS 
* ELECTED BRUCE GROSS AS NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF LENNAR FINANCIAL SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
